attributes.action: For appology to MP George Galloway from the government and parliament for ignoring the assault on George Galloway MP.
attributes.additional_details: In light of the man who attacked The Rt. Hon George galloway MP. We the people think it only fair the house mentions and deplores such behaviour from any person to members of the British Parliament. The Speaker of the house of commons or the priminister should mention issue George with a full appology for not looking after there own. A jogger bumps into David camjeron and get all over the news talked about, george gets viciously attacked and nothing.
